title: How to Delete a Script in Tampermonkey

steps.title: Open the Tampermonkey extension menu.
steps.content: Open the Tampermonkey extension menu. You will see the black or grey coloured icon on the top bar of your browser. If you can't find it, click on the â‹® icon at the top-right.

steps.title: Click on Dashboard from the drop-down.
steps.content: Click on Dashboard from the drop-down. This action will lead you to a new window.

steps.title: Navigate to the script which you want to remove from your browser.
steps.content: Navigate to the script which you want to remove from your browser. Click on the trash bin icon, near your script's name.

steps.title: Confirm your action.
steps.content: Confirm your action. Click on the OK button to completely remove the script from your system. Done!
